com.microblink.recognizers.settings

Interface GlareDetectorOptions

  • All Superinterfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlinkOCRRecognizerSettings, DetectorRecognizerSettings, TemplatingRecognizerSettings

    public interface GlareDetectorOptions
extends android.os.Parcelable
    Interface that should be implemented by settings for all recognizers that use glare detector.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable

    • Method Detail

      • setDetectGlare

        void setDetectGlare(boolean detectGlare)
        Defines whether glare detector will be used during recognition process. By default this option is set to true and glare detector is used. If the glare detector is used and obtaining of glare metadata is enabled in MetadataSettings with method MetadataSettings.setGlareMetadataAllowed(boolean), glare status will be reported to MetadataListener. Also when glare is detected OCR will not be performed on the affected document position to prevent errors in the extracted data.
        Parameters:
        detectGlare - whether glare detector will be used during recognition process.

      • shouldDetectGlare

        boolean shouldDetectGlare()
        Returns whether glare detector is enabled.
        Returns:
        it the glare detector is enabled returns true, otherwise returns false.
